# Function: throttlerOptions()

```ts
function throttlerOptions<TFn, TOptions>(options): TOptions
```

Defined in: [throttler.ts:95](https://github.com/TanStack/pacer/blob/main/packages/pacer/src/throttler.ts#L95)
